bibl.title: A proposito di Raffaella Cribiore, Writing, Teachers, and Students in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Raffaella CRIBIORE, Writing, Teachers, and Students in Graeco-Roman Egypt (Atlanta, Georgia, 1996). - Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 71 (1999), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 29.
